 Promotion for new Pre-paid Mobile Broadband in July. 
 1. Eligible subscribers: 
 
 N ew pre-paid mobile broadbands 
 
 2. Benefits: 
 a. Promotion for activation: 
 
 
 
 
 Starter Kit 
 
 
 Core balance 
 
 
 Data 1 account 
 
 
 
 
 65.000đ 
 
 
 50.000đ 
 
 
 0,8 GB 
 
 
 
 
 b . Promotion for first 10 top-up: Only applicable for subscribers are activated and recharged in the promotion time . 
 
 Conditions: Top up before one-way suspended and before 24 hour of 90th day from the activation time. 
 Promotion: excluding top up in 3 gold days will be depended on the promotion of that days . 
 25% extra top-up card, especially:
